subject: Attention:  ,
body:
Attention:  ,
I am recently waiting to hear from you for the dispatching of your package to your destination doorstep.
These are account details to make the payment of the courier company delivery fee as soon as possible for immediate shipment to your address. 
Bank Name:Access Bank Nigeria
Account Name: P. O. C.
Account Number: 081629XXXX
Swift Code: ABNGNGLA
Bank Address:Plot 1261 Adeola Hopewell
Street.Victoria Island ,Lagos, Nigeria
Yours Sincerely,
DR. OLIVER ALAWUBA
GROUP MANAGING DIRECTOR/CEO

subject: Re:   Attention:  ,
body:
Hello Dr. Oliver Alawuba,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about the package! Could you please tell me more about what's inside it? Also, could you provide some more details about the courier company that will be delivering it? I'd love to know how long they've been in business and if they have a good track record.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Anna

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
*Dear **Anna, *



















*Your mail is acknowledged.This is a United Nation Compensation Program and
your email was selected so follow instructions to enable you to receive
your Compensation Fund via Atm Visa Card. You are advised to forward your
personal information as listed Below for immediate commencement of the Atm
Card Activation process.Your Full Names:.............Contact
address:..........Telephone
Number:..............City:.................................Zip
Code:...................ID CARD if any:....................Please note that
as soon as I receive your information as stated above, the concerned Bank
will issue the Card in your name and the Copy will be sent to you via email
attachment for your view before dispatch to your address.Do not delay to
get back to us.Yours Sincerely,DR. OLIVER ALAWUBAGROUP MANAGING
DIRECTOR/CEO*

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Hello Anna,

Wow, that's really exciting news! I can't believe my email was selected for the United Nations Program. It's such an honor to be considered for this opportunity.

Could you please tell me more about this program? How was my email chosen? And what exactly does receiving funds via an ATM Visa Card entail?

I'm also curious about the process of activating the card. Could you provide more details on how that works?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anna
